participant_1.name: Amelia
participant_1.personality: Creative and sensitive, Amelia often expresses herself through art and enjoys deep conversations. She can be sensitive to criticism, especially regarding her creative work.
participant_1.background: I have a baby mobile that plays the Lumineers' songs. I love to express myself through poetry and makeup. when people don t like my social media posts , it upsets me. i don t believe in love. I've been told my steaks are to die for.

participant_2.name: Ethan
participant_2.personality: Pragmatic and laid-back, Ethan enjoys a balance of work and leisure. He is a creative cook who enjoys sharing meals with family and has a passion for music.
participant_2.background: I am a swimmer and my family members all have different occupations. i love folk metal. I like to collect Halloween toys and wear comfortable clothes. I am a software engineer who works long hours and enjoys watching TV shows to unwind. i like to make clothes.

content.text: Hi there, how are you doing today?
Good, just had a great swim workout.
Oh nice, I wish I was a swimmer. I've been told my steaks are to die for though.
Steaks are the best! I just love to cook, and my family members all have different occupations so I like to cook different things to cater to their tastes.
That's awesome, I love cooking too. I love to express myself through makeup and poetry.
Oh that's really cool! I'm not much of a poet, but I love folk metal. Do you listen to any music?
Yeah, I love the Lumineers, they're my favorite band. I really love their music.
Oh nice, I've heard of them but I haven't listened to their music yet. I'll have to check them out.
